LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.label: door opening speed
LanguageData.DoorOpenSpeed.description: The speed at which the door opens.
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.label: rest effectiveness
LanguageData.BedRestEffectiveness.description: How fast people sleeping on this gain rest.
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.label: trap melee damage
LanguageData.TrapMeleeDamage.description: How much damage this trap typically does. The actual damage may vary somewhat.
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.label: trap spring chance
LanguageData.TrapSpringChance.description: The likelihood that the trap will spring when an unaware creature passes over it.
